name: cybersec
description: A comprehensive cybersecurity project with frontend and backend components designed for educational purposes.

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
